input.sentences: a man was preparing for his wedding .
him and his bride were overjoyed to say their vows .
the posed for some photos afterwards .
they made sure to get a photo with their wedding party .
the venue was set and waiting for them .
output.sentences: I spent hours before my wedding preparing for everything.
As a bride, I was overjoyed to hear the vows written by my groom.
After the vows were exchanged, we posed for wedding photos.
After the last wedding photo was taken, the after party began,.
The venue was set up like a disco and I waited for my wedding song to start playing.
